name: Gender and Education
description: An examination of a number of key issues in the sociology of education, focusing particularly upon gender and higher education.
prerequisites: [SOCB05H3 or [(SOCB40H3) and (SOCB41H3)] or STAB23H3] and [0.5 credit from the following: SOCB30H3, SOCB42H3, SOCB43H3, SOCB47H3, (SOCC39H3)]
